## `Reload` {#batch-reload}

Reanalyzes the project's documents.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
Reload()
```

### See also {-}

[`DelayReloading()`](#batch-delayreloading)

:::: {.notesection data-latex=""}
After calling this, delayed reloading will be reset.
